channel.title: I need a stable downloadable silab client with IP entery
channel.description:
Alright, so this is my problem. I got my self a server running 24/7 but i can not connect to it propperly, myself. The problem is that i dont have a client, i tend to use silabsoft.org and moparisthebest.com but those are really instable(atleast they are for me)
So now i have been trying like 25 clients i found on here but i cant seem to be able to adjust them to my IP, so now im looking for a client like moparisthebest.com one that you need to fill in the IP and/or Port (but port is default one so.)
Can anyone help me how i can make this or were i can find a client such as this?
Thanks allot,
Powned_tv.

item.title: I need a stable downloadable silab client with IP entery
item.dc:creator: @x1_f4t3_1x x1 f4t3 1x
item.description:
@x1_f4t3_1x wrote:

are you trying to connect with your server IP, or 0.0.0.0.if you use the server IP, try to use 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
